title: Week 13 Preview: Cowboys stayin' alive & some key NFC matchups
itunes:title: Week 13 Preview: Cowboys stayin' alive & some key NFC matchups
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Gregg Rosenthal & Marc Sessler- tell you everything you need to know heading into Week 13. Dan and Gregg start the show off with a recap of Thursday night's Cowboys-Redskins game (1:00), where Gregg went into the future to lock up his pick (9:30); Are there any real concerns about Tom Brady's achilles injury? (24:00); Marc gets bold with his Lock of the Week, picking a struggling team with a new QB on the road (29:00); Will the J-E-T-S Jets need a comeback kernel to pull off a victory over the Chiefs? (45:00); A rare mild-mannered Lock pick for The Ol' Zeuser, who is leading the season's lock standings by a wide margin (58:00); A glimpse of irate Giants fans reacting to the Eli benching news via WFAN in New York (1:10:00); An update on the #ATNCat fundraiser (1:22:00); And much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
